entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
